author: saumyaphor4252
body:
##### PR Description #####

Updated the Cosmic Rate Analyzer:
1) added Cosmic Hit Rate by PIXEL layers evaluation: 
       a) plugins/CosmicRateAnalyzer.cc
       b) macros/CosmicRateTool_PIXEL_HitRates.C
2) Improved the layout of output plots (labels, titles, marker size, frame)
       a) macros/CosmicRateTool_Kinematics.C
       b) macros/CosmicRateTool_CosmicRates.C
3) Updated the paths in 
       a) scripts/runPlotter.sh 
       b) scripts/runListId.sh
title: CosmicRateAnalyzer Updates: added PIXEL Hit Rate + improved Plots layout
